link.title: COVID-19 INFORMATION
link.script:

div.p: Find Free Meals Provided for Children While Schools are Closed

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Information for Chromebook Laptops and Internet Connectivity
San Diego Unified schools and central office are closed, but learning is OPEN! See our Distance Learning Plan.
For instructions on pick-up for Chromebook laptops and assistance with internet connectivity, click here. To check your device pick-up location, date, and time, please click here.
We are also continuing to provide free meals for children at several Food Services sites.
